QuestData.Title: Honing Instincts
QuestData.Description:
It looks like our little friend is anxious and ready to practice more combat.
Would you care to show him the ropes?
QuestData.LogDescription: Use H'partho's Whistle to summon your Aqir Hatchling and battle enemies in Uldum or Vale of Eternal Blossoms. Fighting tougher and rarer enemies will help your hatchling grow faster.
